title: Exploring places....
text: I enjoy travelling. Every quarter, I plan a trip with my family to visit famous places, eat delicious food, meet locals, and return with fond memories.

title: Now I'm a Graduate :)
subtitle: Computer Science graduate 2021
text: I graduated in 2021 with a major in computer science.

title: The Real Adventure!
text: I joined Pega Systems as an Associate Applications Engineer.
